stun_command_list.command: execute if predicate incendium:random/40 run effect give @s star:really_stun_immunity 2
execute unless entity @s[tag=1-2health_below] run indestructible @s play "epicfight:biped/combat/hit_long" 0.1 1
execute if entity @s[tag=1-2health_below] run indestructible @s play "epicfight:biped/living/walk" 0.1 1
